column5: WTG Gerritt. Give us a report on your first day! Two thumbs up to HH...nice job, man.
Congratulations and good luck Gerritt!  I've also had assistance from Joe and he knows the industry very well. Offered me some excellent advice.  HG
Fabulous news Gerritt.  Like Roy said, give us a report. YOu're the best HeadHunter!
WTG Gerritt and I do not think you will be off of the forum much....just don't peak from work you have a job to do  LOL  Headhunter just simply said "Good of You"   Regards, Sam
Best of luck to you Gerritt and lots of credit to you also Headhunter.
Congrats Gerritt, I hope everything goes well for you!  Headhunter is a great guy, he has helped me out in the past and offers some great advice!
Good luck buddy!
Good to hear Gerritt,  All the best on your new job!!

Thanks for the kind words everyone! I simply put an old friend and a relatively new friend (Gerritt) together! My old friend had a real need for some help and I saw Gerritt as a good fit! Best of luck Gerritt... Marcus is a great guy and I'm sure you'll enjoy working for him! HH
Opps! double post!
Good luck with the new job Gerritt.  WTG HH!    HH is certainly one of the good ones.     I'll ditto that as well.
I hope your first day is going well...  Good on both of you two...
Good luck bro...
Gerrett, that is great news, this couldn't of happened to a more deserving person.  All the best  John
Well...... how did your day go? Did you remember to bring the new boss a shinny red apple? Were your shoes shined and your hair slicked back? first impressions are ever lasting.  Art
Under promise and over deliver, and cooperate with everyone until and unless they don't cooperate with you.  Those two things will take you a long way.  Good Luck, Gerritt, and keep smiling.

Thanks everyone!  I had a fantastic day! things went smoothly, I was shown around and was given a desk etc, was shown the filing system etc... My boss and I worked together throughout the day, was given a bunch of responsibility and made some key decisions (mainly moving them to High Speed internet etc...) Bought some new computer hardware.... Also had a bit of excitement mixed in there as well, but I will save that for perhaps another day.....  All in all a great day and cant wait to get back at it tomorrow!  Gerritt.
Good stuff Gerritt. Glad to see things are looking well for you.
Hope they aren't buying any Mac crap. High speed internet, so Gerritt doesn't have to do the dialup dance at lunch to look at everyone else fishing while he is working eh.
Congradulations bud.  I'm sure you'll do just fine at the new position.  Another example why I'm proud to be an OFNCer. Nice move head hunter.
Congrats Gerritt

Well as everyone here knows I have been dealing with a busted hand and as a result of that I was unable to work without serious pain in my present occcupation. A couple weeks ago I made a post here on OFC if anyone knew of any positions available as I was having difficulty finding any decent jobs here in Hamilton that weren't General Labour positions. While I had a great deal of responses via PM wishing me good luck, and even a couple odd job inqueries. That is until I received a PM from a certain person here that deals in job placements......HeadHunter..... Turns out he had a client/friend that was looking for someone with my exact qualifications, Some that is able to read blueprints, knows the trades, and has sound computer skills. I was put into contact with this firm and a interview was lined up. I was the only candidate and the only one interviewed for this position. All this transpired over the last two weeks.... and I am happy to say I start back to work tomorrow!!! Man am I looking forward to getting back into the mix!  So in this post I want to publicly thank Headhunter for all the work he put forth to make this happen..... Thank YOU!  I would also like to thank everyone that sent me their best wishes and letters of encouragement.... Thank YOU!   I will be spending less hours here a day... I hope the withdrawal is not to bad!!!   Enjoy the day folks... it is beautiful outside!!  Me? I will be at the outlaws for supper.   Gerritt.
wow that's great....Headhunter's the MAN.......
Gerritt, they got a good man for the job.  Best to you.
Best of luck to you.

Fantastic... it takes the worry of supporting your family away.  I fished with HH when he was in my area 2 years ago and found him to be a nice person ( he didn't complain when we didn't catch any smallmouth ) so I'm not surprised he was able to help you.  Enjoy the new job!
WOOHOOOOOO, Its about time.  No more babblings from Gerritt  Tybo
Thats great news Gerritt  Its great to have good people here like Headhunter. Hope you can still get a couple days to come up here fishing.

Good stuff... I know Headhunter had something lined up for me as well, but I ended up taking a job much closer to home. Joe (Headhunter) is excellent to deal with and gives solid advice for people to tweak out their resume's and such and can find you a job if you have the right stuff.  Enjoy the drive Gerritt  cd.
Congrats buddy,I thought you started last week.Thanx Headhunter for getting Gerrit out of here for a few hours a day! Joe
Congrats Gerritt, I am sure the company will benefit from adding you to their team.  How wonderful it is to yet again see the generosity of those on this site.  Drive safe!  Jen
Good Luck with the new job, and great work Headhunter!
Darn I was just about to hire you too..... Congradulations on the job and thanks HH for helping my bud out.  Art
GREAT stuff Gerritt and HH !!!  Hope it goes great and you enjoy your new career.  All the best  Maureen
Congrats Gerritt!
Well that's fantastic news Gerritt.  Good luck tomorrow.  Now remember, no two hour liquid lunches  Headhunter, you're great!  Joey
congrats gerrit!~
About time you got a job! LOL Good Luck Gerritt! LOL now all you need is someone to find you fish!  Nice work Headhunter!
sounds good to us gerritt,good luck on your new job,and it just proves again that us OFC members are always looking out for eachother...  .congrats to headhunter.....cheers

Congratulations Gerritt!!  All the best!   Did you make sure you have at least a few days to go fishing?  When you lose to Team 9 I don't want the new job to be your fallback excuse  Bly  Headhunter...kudos to you also!!

Great news Gerritt!  Glad to hear this and best of luck  Now that you are back to work...I'm sure your home needs something like windows...doors...siding....something, right? I happen to know just the guy to help you out All joking aside, I hope your hand does well and the job is perfect.
WTG Gerritt!   This site has the most helpfull people around... hope you don't far from the puter!!   Rob C
Way to go Headhunter and Good Luck with the job Gerritt.
Well now, that is great news. You should have mentioned it in chat earlier tonight, cause I didn't read this until you left. Congrats.
Sounds like a win win situation to me!  Nice work Headhunter and Good Luck with the job Gerritt.  Ahhhh, the power of OFC!
Glad to see it all worked out Gerritt.
